騎虎の勢い: (きこのいきおい) - having no choice but to carry on; having no choice but to go on; unable to change one's course of action; a man riding a tiger cannot disembark halfway through
騎銃: (きじゅう) - carbine (short gun used by cavalry)
騎馬民族: (きばみんぞく) - an equestrian tribe
騎馬警官: (きばけいかん) - mounted police officer
騏驎: (キリン) - giraffe (Giraffa camelopardalis); qilin (Chinese unicorn); (麒麟 only) Kirin (brand of beer); (騏驎 only)  horse that can ride 1000 ri in a day
騒がす: (さわがす) - to annoy; to cause trouble
騒がせる: (さわがせる) - to disturb; to alarm; to agitate; to cause anxiety (to); to trouble
騒がれる: (さわがれる) - to be made much of; to be lionized; to be sought after
騒ぎたてる: (さわぎたてる) - to make a fuss (outcry, uproar)

騒ぎ立てる: (さわぎたてる) - to make a fuss (outcry, uproar)
騒ぐ: (さわぐ) - to make noise/to make racket/to be noisy; to rustle/to swoosh; to make merry; to clamor/to clamour/to make a fuss/to kick up a fuss; to lose one's cool/to panic/to act flustered; to feel tense/to be uneasy/to be excited
騒めく: (ざわめく) - to be noisy; to be astir; to rustle; to murmur
騒乱状態: (そうらんじょうたい) - state of rebellion
騒乱罪: (そうらんざい) - crime of rioting
騒動: (そうどう) - strife/riot/rebellion/turmoil; (media) uproar/brouhaha/(public) outcry; feud/tussle/quarrel/dispute
騒擾罪: (そうじょうざい) - (the crime of) rioting
騒音公害: (そうおんこうがい) - noise pollution
騒音防止法: (そうおんぼうしほう) - Noise Abatement Act
験す: (ためす) - to attempt; to test; to try out
験する: (けんする) - to attempt; to test; to try out
験の証拠: (ゲンノショウコ) - Thunberg's geranium (Geranium thunbergii)
験を担ぐ: (げんをかつぐ) - to be superstitious
験担ぎ: (げんかつぎ) - superstition; acting superstitiously (for good luck)
験直し: (げんなおし) - improvement in one's luck; changing one's luck
験算: (けんざん) - verification of accounts; checking figures; arithmetic check
験者: (けんじゃ) - mountaineering ascetic; practitioner of mountain asceticism
騙くらかす: (だまくらかす) - to trick; to cheat; to deceive
騙しこむ: (だましこむ) - to deceive; to ensnare
騙しとる: (だましとる) - to take something away by deception
騙し取る: (だましとる) - to take something away by deception
騙し合う: (だましあう) - to cheat each other
騙し討ち: (だましうち) - surprise attack; sneak attack; foul play
騙し込む: (だましこむ) - to deceive; to ensnare
騙し騙し: (だましだまし) - using every trick (in the book)
騙す: (だます) - to trick/to cheat/to deceive; to coax/to wheedle/to soothe and humor (humour)
騙る: (かたる) - to swindle/to cheat/to take (something) away by deception; to misrepresent oneself (as)/to lie (e.g. about one's name or status)/to falsify (e.g. a seal)/to assume (a name)/to pretend (to be)
騰落: (とうらく) - rise and fall; fluctuations; ups and downs
騰貴: (とうき) - rise (in price or value); inflation; appreciation (economic)
騷ぐ: (さわぐ) - to make noise/to make racket/to be noisy; to rustle/to swoosh; to make merry; to clamor/to clamour/to make a fuss/to kick up a fuss; to lose one's cool/to panic/to act flustered; to feel tense/to be uneasy/to be excited

驍将: (ぎょうしょう) - veteran general; leader
驕りたかぶる: (おごりたかぶる) - to flaunt one's success; to be proud of one's success; to be puffed up with success
驕り高ぶる: (おごりたかぶる) - to flaunt one's success; to be proud of one's success; to be puffed up with success
驕る: (おごる) - (esp. 奢る) to give (someone) a treat; to be extravagant/to live luxuriously; (esp. 驕る 傲る) to be proud/to be haughty
驕る平家は久しからず: (おごるへいけはひさしからず) - (proverb)  pride goes before a fall; pride comes before a fall; the proud Heike family does not last long

驕児: (きょうじ) - spoiled child; spoilt child

驕恣: (きょうし) - being proud and self-willed
驕肆: (きょうし) - being proud and self-willed

驚かせる: (おどろかせる) - to surprise; to frighten; to create a stir

驚くべき: (おどろくべき) - astonishing; amazing; surprising; wonderful
驚倒: (きょうとう) - being very surprised; being utterly astonished; being shocked
驚嘆: (きょうたん) - wonder; admiration; being struck with admiration
驚天動地: (きょうてんどうち) - (yoji) astounding; startling; world-shaking; amazing; earth-shattering
驚愕: (きょうがく) - surprise; fright; shock; amazement; astonishment
